item.description:
Join us for dinner at the Barking Crab restaurant in Boston. The Barking Crab is a casual seafood restaurant on the Boston harbor waterfront. Meet us there by car, T or paddle there with us! We'll meet at our normal practice meeting spot at 4:30, paddle to the Barking Crab (a leisurely 15min paddle), have dinner, and paddle back.

For those of you who have thought you wanted to try dragonboating but never had a chance to come out to one of our practices, this would be a great way to try it out in a low-pressure, informal setting.

One requirement: if you paddle there, you have to paddle back. It's not far, or a strenuous paddle, but it's just difficult to get a dragonboat back to our docks if people choose not to paddle back.

If your'e interested in joining us, please RSVP to the meetup, or you can email any of the organizers. Hope to see you there.
item.name: Paddle to the Barking Crab Restaurant!
